main event: Several residents of Charlotte County, Florida observed bright white lights alternately blinking red and green in the sky on the nights of October 17th, 18th, and 19th, 1966.
interesting points: Seven star-like objects were sighted with no discernible shape,The objects had pulsating centers that appeared green,The sightings lasted for three hours and thirty minutes,Observers used various optical aids including binoculars and a telescope,Weather conditions were clear during the sightings.
sighted object: seven star-like objects in the sky
witness description: Civilians, including retirees, housewives, and a newspaper reporter
